title: Plus Desk
description: A site for our team, with an updating article list, including mine. Made with Astro, SolidJS, Tailwind CSS and TypeScript.

title: U.S. elections 2024
description: Designed and implemented a serverless backend on AWS powering live coverage on web and broadcast TV.

title: Koronavirus lukuina
description: Frontend and backend development for self-updating Covid-19 data dashboard, totaling more than 100 million page views among all its parts and iterations.

title: Musapeli
what: A game to test your musicality
description: Can you tell the difference between a major and a minor chord, pitches and instruments? A game to test your musical ear. Uses Tone.js.

title: Kadonnut linnoitus
description: A 3D model of a fortification in the Helsinki capital region. Made with Polycam, Blender and react-three-fiber.

title: Mitä jää
description: Designed and implemented a layout for a climate-change article shot in Svalbard. The Society of News Design awarded a bronze medal to the story in 2021.

title: Hallituspeli
description: A game to explore party coalitions after the Finnish parliamentary election of spring 2023.

title: Kaltoin kohdellut
description: Extracting and analyzing data from five years of district-court documents on animal-abuse cases. Utilized OCR tools.

title: Nimesi huippuhetket
description: Visualizing first names in Finland from 1900–2020, a variety of widgets and interactive graphics. The very first thing I got paid to code!
